General.Name: SKM Egg Products Export (India) Limited
General.Description: SKM Egg Products Export (India) Limited produces and sells eggs and egg products. The company offers various egg powders, including whole egg powder for use in biscuits, cakes, bakery mixes, pasta, sauces, dressings, ready meals, quiches, omelettes, mayonnaise, meat products, and other emulsified systems; and egg yolk powder for use in mayonnaise, dressings, sauces, Spanish bread, croissants, pasta, and ice-cream, as well as egg albumen powder for use in meat products comprising sausages, luncheon meat, and hams; fish products, including fish cakes, crab sticks, and surimi; potato mixes; and the production of stable oil based emulsions. It also provides bakery mix products for use in cheese cakes, biscuits, cakes, sponge cakes, Swiss rolls, etc.; and liquid eggs comprising whole egg liquids, egg yolk liquids, egg albumen liquids, and customized egg liquids for use in cakes, meringues, noodles, mayonnaise, sauces, bakeries, fine food, ice-creams, cosmetics, bakery, confectionery, and pastries. In addition, the company purchases and sells in poultry feed products. It serves Russia, Japan, Europe, Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, Nigeria, Taiwan, the United Arab Emirates and other Gulf countries, Malaysia, India, the Philippines, Denmark, Peru, Sweden, Iran, South Korea, Ghana, Uganda, Israel, Sri Lanka, and internationally. SKM Egg Products Export (India) Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Erode, India.
